name: DON'T WAKE THE NIGHT - Halloween demo
name_original: DON'T WAKE THE NIGHT - Halloween demo
description:
…And with great apprehension she said,

Welcome to the latest DON'T WAKE THE NIGHT demo! Mystery abounds still, as you, the ghost a community of witches has summoned, must act as their impartial judge. But for what purpose?

DON’T WAKE THE NIGHT, FOR ITS DARKNESS WILL REVEAL THE TRUTH

Team:

Gabriela Aveiro-Ojeda – Creator (design, story, art)

Karlo Feliciano – Programming

Halina Heron – Sound

Jo Fu – Production

Voice talent – Meagan Byrne, Leisha-Marie Riddel, Iris Robin, Leilah Dhore, Bishara Mohamed, Lequanne Collins-Bacchus, Tia Camilleri, Hadiyya M

This project was made possible thanks to support from:
